data.name: BearButtonTooltip
data.value: Generate a Bear Toolkit link from the Hunt Helper train recorder.

data.name: SirenButtonTooltip
data.value: Siren Hunts is not yet implemented. Coming soon!

data.name: CopyModeTooltipSummary
data.value: The copy mode that tracker generators will use when generating tracker links.

data.name: CopyModeTooltipLinkDesc
data.value: only copies the generated tracker link to your clipboard

data.name: CopyModeTooltipFullTextDesc
data.value: copies a full-text template to your clipboard, which can contain data about the scouted marks beyond just the tracker link. click on the '?' currently underneath your mouse, to open the SCOUT HELPER settings and configure the template, or open the settings from the Dalamud plugin installer screen.

data.name: ConfigWindowTemplateDesc
data.value: Configure the template used by the full-text copy mode. When the full-text mode is selected, this template is what will be copied to your clipboard, rather than just the generated tracker link. Variables can be referenced by surrounding them with curly braces (e.g. "{link}"), and the following variables are available:

data.name: ConfigWindowTemplateVariables
data.value:
{#} - the number of hunt marks in the train.
{#max} - the maximum possible number of hunt marks in the patch.
{link} - the generated tracker link \(≧▽≦)/
{patch} - the latest patch contained in the recorded train. If there are 6 HW marks and 1 SHB mark in the train, the patch will be SHB.
{tracker} - the name of the tracker used (e.g. "bear").
{world} - the current world you are in. Make sure to use the link generator before you change worlds, if you include this in your template ;P
